QuestData.Title: The Source of the Madness
QuestData.Description: After reducing the basilisk blood out of the elixir, I've uncovered an unusual precipitate. It appears to be a blue crystal of some sort...$b$b<Brother Nimetz consults his notes.>$b$bIt's not a singing blue crystal... not a pulsing blue shard...$b$b<He flips forward a few pages.>$b$b... not a piece of the Mind's Eye. Nope, this isn't something we've seen before in Stranglethorn. If anyone has any more of this substance, I want it. Check the high-ranking Kurzen troops, in the back of their cave.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Whispering Blue Stone from Kurzen troops within the Stockpile.
QuestData.CompletionText: Make sure you handle that stuff carefully, $n. We don't know what it is.
QuestData.RewardText: <Brother Nimetz opens up a pouch and lets you place the crystal inside.>$b$bI knew they'd have some more of this substance. I'm going to send this to my contacts at Fort Livingston, to the south. Hopefully they'll have some more luck with it.$b$bThank you for everything, $n.
